alert.note: Alert for Chenango; Otsego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 04 at 5:29PM EDT until August 04 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Otsego County in central New York... Northeastern Chenango County in central New York... * Until 615 PM EDT. * At 529 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Smyrna, or 7 miles south of Hamilton, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Edmeston, Sherburne, Pittsfield, New Berlin, Columbus, Earlville, Smyrna, South Edmeston and Lambs Corners. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Heavy rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
